package.name: org.apache.hadoop.tools.dynamometer.blockgenerator

types.documentation:
/**
 * This is the main driver class. It takes in the following arguments: -
 * Required: input path of the fsImage from the HDFS cluster to be simulated -
 * Required: output path for generated block image files for each Dynamometer
 * DataNode - Required: Number of DataNodes to generate blocks for - Optional:
 * Number of reducers to use for the job (defaults to number of DataNodes)
 */
types.name: GenerateBlockImagesDriver

arguments.value: "Input path to the Hadoop fsImage XML file (required)"

operandl.value: "Directory where the generated files containing the "

operandr.value: "block listing for each DataNode should be stored (required)"

arguments.value: "Number of reducers for this job (defaults to number of datanodes)"
"Number of DataNodes to create blocks for (required)"

body.documentation: /** A simple text input format that doesn't allow splitting of files. */
body.name: NoSplitTextInputFormat
